mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.ad_group_id AS "adGroupId", a.ad_equity_id AS "adEquityId", a.ad_group_equity_status AS "adGroupEquityStatus", a.ad_group_level AS "adGroupLevel", a.equity_name AS "equityName", a.equity_type AS "equityType", a.display_order AS "displayOrder", a.enable_status AS "enableStatus", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id"
mapper.select:
SELECT , e.equity_logo AS "equityLogo", e.interface_url AS "interfaceUrl" FROM ad_group_equity_level a INNER JOIN ad_equity e ON a.ad_equity_id = e.id WHERE a.ad_group_id = #{groupId} AND a.ad_group_equity_status = 1 AND a.enable_status = 1 ORDER BY a.display_order, a.update_date DESC
LIMIT #{limitCount}
